author: 小浪财讯
title: 电池30ETF（159757）跌0.54%，半日成交额709.52万元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，电池30ETF（159757）跌0.54%，报0.551元，成交额709.52万元。电池30ETF（159757）重仓股方面， 比亚迪 截止午盘跌1.40%， 宁德时代 跌1.13%， 亿纬锂能 涨0.35%， 三花智控 涨3.26%， 华友钴业 跌0.69%， 赣锋锂业 跌0.45%， 格林美 跌0.97%， 欣旺达 跌0.86%， 国轩高科 涨0.73%， 先导智能 跌1.97%。
电池30ETF（159757）业绩比较基准为 国证新能源车电池指数 收益率，管理人为景顺长城基金管理有限公司，基金经理为张晓南，成立（2021-07-21）以来回报为-44.62%，近一个月回报为-3.00%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: Medscape
title: AI for Lower Drug Costs: Finding Cheaper Repurposed Meds
text: Summary and Key Highlights Summary: This section delves into the potential for AI to transform drug repurposing by evaluating millions of drug-disease possibilities, identifying low-cost drugs that could be effective against various conditions. AI's ability to sift through vast amounts of data allows researchers to find inexpensive drugs that can be tested and fast-tracked into clinical trials. This approach opens up new opportunities to address diseases with affordable medications, bypassing the traditional, often costly drug development process. However, the discussion also acknowledges the regulatory challenges that could arise from using AI in this way. Key Takeaways: - AI can evaluate millions of drug-disease combinations to find low-cost treatment options. - Inexpensive, effective drugs identified through AI can be rapidly tested and adopted. - Regulatory issues will need to be addressed when applying AI-driven drug repurposing. Our Editors Also Recommend: [AI's Drug Revolution, Part 1: Faster Trials and Approvals](https://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/ais-drug-revolution-part-1-faster-trials-and-approvals-2024a1000ggz)[From AI to Obesity Drugs to Soaring Costs: Medscape Hot Topics in the Medical Profession Report 2024](https://www.medscape.com/slideshow/2024-current-issues-rpt1-6017624#7)[AI Voice Analysis for Diabetes Screening Shows Promise](https://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/ai-voice-analysis-diabetes-screening-shows-promise-2024a1000ggw) >> To see the full event recording, [Click Here](https://www.medscape.com/s/viewarticle/revolutionizing-healthcare-al-driven-solutions-2024a1000hw6)
